# ThirdParty - Module Instructions

Third-party library integrations and wrappers.

---

## Module Purpose

Provides KMP-compatible wrappers for third-party libraries.

---

## Key Rules

| Rule | Requirement |
|------|-------------|
| Inherit Global | All rules from `/Volumes/M-Drive/Coding/.claude/CLAUDE.md` |
| Inherit Project | All rules from `../../.claude/CLAUDE.md` |
| Platform Support | KMP (Android, iOS, Desktop) |
| Wrapper Pattern | Abstract platform-specific APIs |

---

## Technology Stack

- KMP expect/actual pattern
- Platform-specific implementations
